naviboard.title: Naviboard
naviboard.text: Japan Railway, who is our end client, presented the project during a tech event last November. The system is composed of an admin website, an IOS application, and a display website. On the admin website, a user can configure the maps, their destinations, paths, and beacons. With the IOS application, users can load the maps, select a destination, and follow instructions to get there. After selecting a destination, each user gets a personal icon so they can be directed throughout the station by looking at the displays instead of their phone. The system uses beacon technology to calculate a smartphone's position. The IOS application communicates with the display through WebSockets. New features are currently being added: a voice helper that uses AWS Polly and a video player on the displays.

loco.title: Loco
loco.text: Loco is an admin website where users can set up beacons and maps (the most common would be a shop's floor or a station map). They can then use the beacon technology inside their shops with their smartphone application.

rflocus.title: RF Locus
rflocus.text: RFLocus is a reporting website that aims to help manage the data provided by the RFID technology (scan items codes in stores). The system displays articles that have been scanned, the stocks, the shipments, the arrivals, and the inventories. Inside the settings page, an admin user can configure the whole system and manage how the data will be displayed.

motivo.title: Motivo
motivo.text: Motivo CRM is a recruiting system application, composed of three websites: candidate, recruiter, company. The candidate can create multiple profiles, connect with recruiters, look at the job offers, apply to one, manage tasks within a kanban board (like Trello), respond to invitations or create events on a calendar, chat with people or send emails. Recruiters and companies have access to the same technology with some personalized features.

chatbot.title: Chat Bot
chatbot.text: The chatbot can be easily integrated into any website and will display a form, customized by an admin on the management website. The form information is stored and available to the admin.
